DOC.brief_summary: This study design recall patient receive full-arch monolithic zirconia implant support fixed dental prosthesis University North Carolina ( UNC ) School Dentistry Graduate Prosthodontic and/or Dental Faculty Practice clinic January 1 , 2008 September 1 , 2015 . The main purpose evaluate biological technical complication associate form prosthetic treatment . Additionally patient center outcomes evaluate .
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : A retrospective single-center study provide scientific data clinical performance full-arch monolithic zirconia implant support fixed dental prosthesis ( MZISFDP ) . Participants : Individuals least one edentulous dental arch ( maxilla/mandible ) treat UNC Graduate Prosthodontic clinic Dental Faculty Practice January 1 , 2008 September 1 , 2015 full-arch MZISFDP . Procedures ( method ) : This study design retrospective descriptive study single prospective examination population subject previously restore full-arch MZISFDPs . An estimated 60 participant enrol study . The study include retrospective data radiograph collection dental record well data collection one prospective visit include clinical examination , panoramic radiograph 2 patient questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 18 year old Good physical health ( American Society Anesthesiologist classification I ( ASA I ) II ( ASA II ) undergo routine comprehensive recall examination 1 . ASA I A normal healthy patient 2 . ASA II A patient mild systemic health . Able give inform consent At least one edentulous arch ( maxilla and/or mandible ) treatment plan restore full arch MZISFDP UNC Graduate Prosthodontic clinic and/or UNC Dental Faculty Practice January 1 , 2008 September 1 , 2015 Pregnancy status time recall 1 . Women nonchildbearing potential define uterus , ligation fallopian tube , permanent cessation ovarian function due ovarian failure surgical removal ovary ( i.e . permanently sterilize , postmenopausal ) . Postmenopausal define 12 month menses without alternative medical cause `` Nonchildbearing potential '' status determine questionnaire . 2 . Women childbearing potential Female patient n't fulfill `` nonchildbearing potential '' status consider childbearing potential . Status pregnancy determine administer urine pregnancy test If subject find pregnant consent remain study data intraoral exam include subject exclude radiographic examination . Exclusion Criteria History radiotherapy head neck region History intravenous bisphosphonate therapy Medical condition contraindicate elective dental therapy routine recall appointment American Society Anesthesiologist Classification III ( ASA III ) , IV ( ASA IV ) , V ( ASA V ) VI ( ASA VI ) 1 . ASA III patient severe systemic disease 2 . ASA IV patient severe systemic disease constant threat life . 3 . ASA V moribund patient expect survive without operation . 4 . ASA VI declare braindead patient whose organ remove donor purpose . Psychological and/or behavioral condition make routine recall appointment difficult impossible Known alcohol and/or drug abuse
